item.description:
Where active singles ages 30 to 60  go, this is not a boring (hotel dance) with their wimpy mobile sound systems!

Are you tired of wasting money at cash bars? Then join us Friday at Daniels Hall, Rt 4, Nottingham, NH., where single people meet and dance in a friendly & fun environment. Very inexpensive, no need to purchase expensive drinks or tip bartenders, bring your own liquor, non alcoholic drinks can be purchased or bring your own and enjoy a fun evening for singles. Join us and maybe meet that special person. Safe place for women attending alone. Visit our web site for more info and directions or call 603 942-8525 for verbal directions.

Again, there is no need to buy expensive drinks or tip bartenders, just bring your own liquor, free drink set-ups and  buffet are included in the $12 admission. Casual dress is a plus which puts people at ease and makes it easier to join in the fun atmosphere. This dance has been working it's magic for 17 years and is the most heavily advertised singles dance in NH, so there are always new singles to meet at Daniels Hall.

Important: We do not use a small mobile sound system. We have a professional large club system. Nor do we hold our parties in hotels where travelers pretend to be single for the night.

No need to RSVP just join us!

Dave McDermott
"Remember at Daniels Hall your family."

Play the video below to experience a party at Daniels Hall.
item.why: Fast & inexpensive way to find someone new!
item.name: Singles dance party at Daniels Hall
